name: Underrain: Bot Tactics
description:
Underrain: Bot Tactics is a spin-off puzzle game of the upcoming title, Underrain.

It was made in 4 days by the Pillar of Skylines team, as a first experience together.

TEAM:

  • Flavien Birette - Programming
  • Boris Kolimaga - 3D Environment
  • David Liu - Game & Level Design
  • Aloïs Mispelon - Programming
  • Nicolas Nowak - Character Model & Animations
  • Gwendal Reuzé - Game Design & Direction
  • Axel Richet - Game & Level Design
  • Antoine Villecroze - Team & Project Management
